00001 #ifndef TNUMERICVALUE_H
00002 #define TNUMERICVALUE_H

00008 /****************************************************************************
00009 **
00010 ** TNumButtonEditor class
00011 **
00012 *****************************************************************************/
00013 
00014 class LIBVB4_EXPORT TNumButtonEditor : public TSpinButtonEditor
00015 {
00016 public:
00017     TNumButtonEditor();
00018 
00019     // sets Step for spin editing (one click +/-)
00020     double          step() const                    { return m_step;    }
00021     void            setStep(double step)            { m_step = step;    }
00022 
00023     // sets OverSpin mode (i.e. cyclic spinning values)
00024     bool            overSpin() const                { return m_overspin;    }
00025     void            enableOverSpin(bool b = true)   { m_overspin = b;   }
00026 
00027     // sets Logical Count mode (i.e. adds Step for the last non-zero digit 
00028     // of the value, including fraction)
00029     // (in this mode, Step is assumed to be integral, without fraction part)
00030     bool            logCount() const                { return m_logcount;    }
00031     void            enableLogCount(bool b = true)   { m_logcount = b;   }
00032 
00033 protected:
00034     double          m_step;
00035     bool            m_overspin, m_logcount;
00036 
00037     void            doProcess(bool up);
00038 
00039 protected slots:
00040     virtual void    buttonClickedUp();
00041     virtual void    buttonClickedDown();
00042 };
00043

00049 
00050 class LIBVB4_EXPORT TIntegerValue: public TBaseValue
00051 {
00052 public:
00053     TIntegerValue (TValueBrowser *parent, const QString& name, int page = -1, int id = -1);
00054     TIntegerValue (TBaseItem *parent, const QString& name, int id = -1);
00055 
00059     int valueInt() const 
00060     { return m_set.value.toInt(); }
00061 
00062     // Standard button editor.
00063     static TNumButtonEditor *s_NumButtonEditor;
00064 };
